summary: The script sets up a CIFAR‑10 data module and a Lightning model wrapper, runs a training and validation loop under the PyTorch Profiler, and saves separate trace files for the training_step and validation_step. It also provides instructions for visualizing the generated traces using Chrome’s tracing UI or the TensorBoard Profiler.
business_intent: Showcase how to profile deep‑learning workloads with PyTorch Lightning, enabling developers to measure and optimise the performance of training and validation phases.
